pr_title: CATROID-543 Store and display multiplayer variables

timeline.bodyText: Creating new Flaky tests is not a very good idea. Since Flaky tests doesnt really test something, either remove this test or try to fix it,
timeline.author: DinosaurierRex

timeline.bodyText: @wslany Should we already increase language version here ?
timeline.author: DinosaurierRex

replies.bodyText: If the xml structure is changed, then yes.
replies.author: wslany

timeline.message:
CATROID-543 Store and display multiplayer variables

- Add multiplayer variables list in Project
- Add category for multiplayer variables in Data list
- Use multiplayer variables in addition to regular ones where needed
